new_example: Lavo sempre i piatti subito dopo aver mangiato per non accumularli nel lavandino
new_example_english: I always wash dishes immediately after eating to not accumulate them in sink

new_example: Tu lavi mai la macchina a mano o vai sempre all'autolavaggio automatico?

new_example: Lei lava i vestiti dei bambini separatamente dagli altri per evitare danni
new_example_english: She washes children's clothes separately from others to avoid damage

new_example_english: We wash house windows together once a month to keep them clean

new_example: Voi lavate spesso i capelli o aspettate che diventino troppo unti?

new_example: Lavano sempre le mani prima di mangiare seguendo le regole dell'igiene personale
new_example_english: They always wash hands before eating following personal hygiene rules

new_example: Laverò tutti i vestiti sporchi che si sono accumulati durante la settimana
new_example_english: I will wash all dirty clothes that accumulated during the week

new_example_english: They will wash floor with ecological products to respect environment

new_example: Hai lavato le mani dopo aver toccato quegli oggetti sporchi nel garage?
new_example_english: Did you wash hands after touching those dirty objects in garage?

new_example_english: He washed car before selling it to get better price

new_example: Hanno lavato il cane dopo che si era rotolato nel fango del giardino
new_example_english: They washed dog after it rolled in garden mud

new_example: Tu lavori mai durante i fine settimana o riesci a mantenere equilibrio?
new_example_english: Do you ever work during weekends or do you manage to maintain balance?

new_example_english: She works as doctor in hospital helping patients with serious problems

new_example_english: We work together in this company for more than ten years now

new_example: Voi lavorate spesso in squadra o preferite svolgere compiti individuali?
new_example_english: Do you often work in teams or do you prefer performing individual tasks?

new_example_english: They work hard to support family and give good education to children

new_example_english: I will work in company of my dreams after completing all studies

new_example: Tu lavorerai finalmente nel campo che ti appassiona veramente di più?
new_example_english: Will you finally work in field that truly passions you most?

new_example_english: She will work as teacher in elementary school of her town

new_example_english: We will work together to realize this project that is dear to us

new_example_english: They will work day and night to complete project by deadline

new_example_english: I worked for fifteen years in same company before changing completely

new_example_english: He worked all his life to build family's economic empire

new_example_english: We worked together on this project for more than two consecutive years

new_example_english: They worked non-stop to help victims of devastating earthquake

new_example_english: I always send postcards to my friends when traveling to exotic and interesting places
